Package org.dspace.kernel

Interface DSpaceKernel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommonLifecycle<DSpaceKernel>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DSpaceKernelImpl
    public interface DSpaceKernel
extends CommonLifecycle<DSpaceKernel>
    This is the most core piece of the system: instantiating one will startup the dspace services framework.
    Author:
    Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski @ gmail.com)
